goals__remit:
Swedbank's roots are firmly entrenched in Sweden's savings bank history, the cooperative agricultural bank tradition and Hansabank's major role in the Baltic 
countries. We serve everyone, from customers with basic needs to those who require advanced banking services. We work to develop close relationships 
with our seven million private customers and 600 000 corporate customers. To support their businesses, Swedbank also has operations in Norway, Finland, 
Denmark, the US, China, Luxembourg and South Africa. 
Swedbank has, and will maintain, a robust balance sheet that can withstand swings in the business cycle.  
Swedbank is one of the most financially stable banks in Europe and cut off best in the Nordic region in the EBA stress test for 2015.
